conbody.p: T24 IRIS is used to expose T24 data, either as a feed to a UI or via an interface, either as is; or enriched with data from other sources - commonly referred to as a mash-up.
Design Studio (DS) is the IDE for IRIS. It is used for importing and amending T24 data and for the build (compile) of the project to create the war files to be used at runtime.
